summary: Email chain from April 2021 discussing a potential lead regarding Ghislaine Maxwell and Jeffrey Epstein's finances. An NYPD detective turned private security guard for a wealthy individual offers to arrange a meeting with his employer, who allegedly has significant information about Epstein's financial relationships. The correspondence involves FBI agents and an Assistant U.S. Attorney coordinating the potential interview.

persons.name: Paul
persons.role: NYPD / FBI Child Exploitation Human Trafficking Task Force member
persons.context: Sends the main email on April 29, 2021, relaying that a security contact has arranged for his employer to meet with investigators to discuss Epstein's finances.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Central subject of the investigation; the potential witness has information about his finances and relationships.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Mentioned as a subject alongside Epstein; the lead pertains to information about her as well.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: Forwarded the initial lead about a security contact having information on Epstein and Maxwell to the FBI on April 14, 2021.

connections.description: Both are named as subjects of the financial information the potential witness possesses.
The AUSA forwarded a lead to the FBI, which was then handled by Paul's task force, indicating coordination between the U.S. Attorney's Office and law enforcement.

events.title: Coordination for Witness Interview
events.description: Paul emails colleagues to arrange a meeting with a potential witness (a wealthy individual guarded by a former NYPD detective) who claims to have extensive knowledge of Epstein's financial relationships.

events.title: Initial Lead Forwarded to FBI
events.description: An Assistant U.S. Attorney forwards a tip about a private security contact with information on Epstein and Maxwell to the FBI for follow-up.

locations: 86 Chambers Street, Third Floor, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: In April 2021, investigators pursued a lead about a wealthy individual (guarded by a former NYPD detective) who allegedly possessed significant information regarding Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell's financial relationships.
The potential witness was described as working in finance and having documents to share, with homes in New York, Florida, and the Bahamas.
The witness had an attorney but was reportedly willing to speak to law enforcement without the attorney present.
The email chain shows active coordination between an Assistant U.S. Attorney, the FBI, and an NYPD/FBI task force in following up on post-conviction leads related to Epstein's network.
Multiple names and contact details (e.g., mobile number, email) are referenced but are redacted in the provided text.
